org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment

Class Experiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment.Experiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Experiment
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The experiment puts all the parts together. The agent chooses actions and which are then executed in the environment.
    See Also:

      • notify

        public void notify(State s,
                   Action a,
                   State sn,
                   Action an,
                   double r,
                   boolean isTerminalState)
        Sends a notification to all observers
        Parameters:
        s - State at time t
        a - Action at time t
        sn - State at time t+1
        an - Action at time t+1
        r - Reward for doing action a in state s
        isTerminalState - True if sn is a terminal state
